channel.title: //||\\ Looking for a team of developers to develop Zarketh //||\\
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://s953.photobucket.com/user/hareszylip/media/zarketh-banner1_zpsa250aec7.gif.html"][IMG]http://i953.photobucket.com/albums/ae11/hareszylip/zarketh-banner1_zpsa250aec7.gif[/img][/URL]
[B][SIZE=4]Our budget for the [COLOR="#FF0000"]WHOLE[/COLOR] job. [COLOR="#00FF00"]$500[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [B][SIZE=3]Application form:
Age: Location: Time available to develop Zarketh: What payment method would you like: Experience in java: Would you do the whole job:[/CENTER][/SIZE][/B]
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR="#00FF00"]Introduction[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[B][SIZE=4][URL=http://"http://www.Zarketh.com"]Zarketh[/URL] is a RSPS which was created by myself on the 28th of may.[/SIZE][/B]
What type of server am i looking for? These are just examples of the graphics i'd like. Note this is a pk server, i'd like other content like Nex also [URL=http://s953.photobucket.com/user/hareszylip/media/Example_zpsd70098ec.png.html][IMG]http://i953.photobucket.com/albums/ae11/hareszylip/Example_zpsd70098ec.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s953.photobucket.com/user/hareszylip/media/example3_zps37d7ac40.png.html][IMG]http://i953.photobucket.com/albums/ae11/hareszylip/example3_zps37d7ac40.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s953.photobucket.com/user/hareszylip/media/Example2_zpsf5884640.png.html][IMG]http://i953.photobucket.com/albums/ae11/hareszylip/Example2_zpsf5884640.png[/img][/URL]
Since Zarketh has been up we've been swapping sources sources, each time finding it's [B]utterly[/B] useless. Below are the servers we've been through
[B][I]1) [COLOR=#ff9900]Cant remember which it was.. (was released)[/COLOR] 2) [COLOR=#ff6600]Ventrix[/COLOR] 3) [COLOR=#ff3300]Interbellum[/COLOR] 4)[COLOR=#ff0000] Zanaris[/COLOR][/I][/B]
[SIZE=2][FONT=Verdana]I believe that Zarketh will have high potential if i get a coder which knows what he's doing to code me a custom server to my liking, which is bugless zarketh could have the opportunity, finally to thrive. I have plans to make this one of the biggest servers, so far i've re-invested my money back into the server only taking a little for myself, sometimes using the money on useless things, for example paying for work on a released server. Sometimes for things which were necessary like a donation system made by Shaq from Rune-server[/FONT][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR="#00FF00"]Some examples of content wanted[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [B]Some things which would be in the server i'd like made i) Realistic bosses, coded with phases, including nex. ii) Full screen iii) Stable economy[/B]
[B][COLOR="#00FF00"][SIZE=3]Payment[/SIZE] [/COLOR][/B] [B]You may ask, "What will i get out of this? " Well, i've thought of different methods you might be interested. i) Payment for the WHOLE job, this means you will code it till it's ready to be hosted, i understand this isnt a days job. ii) I will NOT pay per hour. iii) We can arrange you to become a coder for Zarketh for the future. iiii) A percentage of donations could come to you. [/B]
[B][SIZE=3][COLOR="#00FF00"]Questions [/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [B]Q)Percentage of donations? You won't earn alot. A)With these shit sources, starting from scratch i made $2000 in my first month, do keep in mind i started from SCRATCH, on some really shit sources.
Q) How would i know Zarketh will succeed? A) Will the right coding, Zarketh can go somewhere, I've already invested 400 Euros in my site. Each person which visits my site is amazed. you can check it out [URL=http://"http://www.zarketh.com"]here[/URL]
Q)How will i be paid? A)You will be paid by a verified paypal business account, which i can prove.
Q)How do i know you're legit? A) I can have various people, which i've ordered things from vouch for me[/B]

item.title: //||\\ Looking for a team of developers to develop Zarketh //||\\
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=4]Our budget for the [COLOR="#FF0000"]WHOLE[/COLOR] job.
[COLOR="#00FF00"]$500[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=3]Application form:

Age:
Location:
Time available to develop Zarketh:
What payment method would you like:
Experience in java:
Would you do the whole job:[/CENTER][/SIZE][/B]

[SIZE=4][COLOR="#00FF00"]Introduction[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Zarketh is a RSPS which was created by myself on the 28th of may.[/SIZE]

What type of server am i looking for? These are just examples of the graphics i’d like. Note this is a pk server, i’d like other content like Nex also


Since Zarketh has been up we’ve been swapping sources sources, each time finding it’s utterly useless. Below are the servers we’ve been through

1) [COLOR=#ff9900]Cant remember which it was… (was released)[/COLOR]
2) [COLOR=#ff6600]Ventrix[/COLOR]
3) [COLOR=#ff3300]Interbellum[/COLOR]
4)[COLOR=#ff0000] Zanaris[/COLOR]

[SIZE=2][FONT=Verdana]I believe that Zarketh will have high potential if i get a coder which knows what he’s doing to code me a custom server to my liking, which is bugless zarketh could have the opportunity, finally to thrive. I have plans to make this one of the biggest servers, so far i’ve re-invested my money back into the server only taking a little for myself, sometimes using the money on useless things, for example paying for work on a released server. Sometimes for things which were necessary like a donation system made by Shaq from Rune-server[/FONT][/SIZE]

[SIZE=4][COLOR="#00FF00"]Some examples of content wanted[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Some things which would be in the server i’d like made
i) Realistic bosses, coded with phases, including nex.
ii) Full screen
iii) Stable economy

[COLOR="#00FF00"][SIZE=3]Payment[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]
You may ask, "What will i get out of this? "
Well, i’ve thought of different methods you might be interested.
i) Payment for the WHOLE job, this means you will code it till it’s ready to be hosted, i understand this isnt a days job.
ii) I will NOT pay per hour.
iii) We can arrange you to become a coder for Zarketh for the future.
iiii) A percentage of donations could come to you.

[SIZE=3][COLOR="#00FF00"]Questions
[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[B]Q)Percentage of donations? You won’t earn alot.
A)With these shit sources, starting from scratch i made $2000 in my first month, do keep in mind i started from SCRATCH, on some really shit sources.

Q) How would i know Zarketh will succeed?
A) Will the right coding, Zarketh can go somewhere, I’ve already invested 400 Euros in my site. Each person which visits my site is amazed.
you can check it out here

Q)How will i be paid?
A)You will be paid by a verified paypal business account, which i can prove.

Q)How do i know you’re legit?
A) I can have various people, which i’ve ordered things from vouch for me[/B]

Read full topic
item.source: //||\\ Looking for a team of developers to develop Zarketh //||\\
